```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)  
library(nycflights13)
```

### 5.6

---
1. 

```{r}
flights |>
  filter(dest == "IAH") |>
  group_by(year, month, day) |>
  summarize(
    n = n(),
    delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) |>
  filter(n > 10)

flights |>
  filter(
    carrier == "UA", 
    dest %in% c("IAH", "HOU"),
    sched_dep_time > 0900,
    sched_arr_time < 2000
    ) |>
  group_by(flight) |>
  summarize(
    delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE),
    cancelled = sum(is.na(arr_delay)),
    n= n() 
  ) |> 
  filter(n > 10)
```
